DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine eight-weeks exercise-based cardiac rehabilitation could improve adiponectin cardiovascular disease risk factor overweight coronary heart disease patient . Patients include study : approve follow physical , physiological psychological test ; take part regular physical activity ; stable heart failure least 3 month . Exclusion criterion include : history surgery within precede 4 month ; unstable angina , acute phase myocardial infarction , and/or unstable arrhythmia ; obstructive cardiomyopathy , exercise-induced ischemia arrhythmia , uncontrolled arrhythmia , rest blood pressure 200/120 millimeter mercury , aortic stenosis , and/or peripheral artery disease ; exercise limitation due neuromuscular and/or musculoskeletal disease ; health problem prevent maximum effort treadmill test . Target population include patient history myocardial infarction diagnosis congestive heart failure refer Isfahan Cardiovascular Research Centre . 60overweight coronary heart disease patient randomly assign either eight-week , three time weekly exercise group ( n=30 ) , non-exercising control group ( n=30 ) . Exercise session take place 60-85 % maximal heart rate , last 45-60 minute include 10-minute warm-up , 40 minute aerobic exercise , consist stationary cycling , walk and/or jogging , flexibility , balance exercise , weight-bearing activity 10-minute cool-down .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Adiponectin Cardiovascular Disease Risk Factors Overweight Patients
DOC.criteria: approve following physical , physiological psychological test ; reside work city Isfahan ; take part regular physical activity ; stable heart failure least 3 month . history surgery within precede 4 month unstable angina , acute phase myocardial infarction ( MI ) , and/or unstable arrhythmia obstructive cardiomyopathy , exerciseinduced ischemia arrhythmia , uncontrolled arrhythmia , rest blood pressure 200/120 millimeter mercury ( mmHg ) , aortic stenosis , and/or peripheral artery disease exercise limitation due neuromuscular and/or musculoskeletal disease , type orthopedic , low back pain , bone fracture le 6 month uncontrolled systemic disease , DM ; 75 year old health problem prevent maximum effort treadmill test unable answer screen questionnaire assess depression anxiety .
